code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';var CartAPI={getCarts:function getCarts(query){var url="/carts".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);},postAddToCart:function postAddToCart(query){var url="/carts/add".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},deleteToCart:function deleteToCart(query){var url="/carts/delete".concat(query);return axiosClient.delete(url);},putToCart:function putToCart(query){var url="/carts/update".concat(query);return axiosClient.put(url);}};export default CartAPI;
